lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like people...no matter where in the world they may live.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school for Mechanical Engineering, and I work a full-time job doing precast concrete.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I find acts of kindness more valuable than monetary gain. I believe that giving a little of ourselves yields a far greater reward than any monetary gain. There are people that would not think of extending any type of help or kindness without the expectation that there will be something in return. Then there are people that can give of themselves and their gifts and feel that the mere act of giving is its own reward. I belong to the latter group.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days assisting people with debilitating illnesses. My true passion however, is spent in the time I spend promoting kindness, unifying community and encouraging people to embrace the sense of fellowship we all have but is oppressed by a "me-first" society.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: Aviation, medical, automotive, industrial control and railway industries have intense software certification requirements. Embedded testing was a costly process until VectorCAST automated unit, integration, and system testing of C, C++ and Ada.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: I can. And that is a great privilege.

lender.name: Gill
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses be more successful.

lender.name: Martin Volejn√≠k
lender.loan_because: There are people out there who need money more than I do. :-)

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: some of my wonderful high school students gave me a kiva gift certificate as a thank you present,

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in self empowerment, and that assuming reasonable risk encourages responsibility and good business.
lender.occupational_info: I make the packaging for Hollywood movies on DVD.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Film-maker

lender.name: Riccardo
lender.loan_because: we are called to sow blessings into the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of a team that is committed to seeing all children benefit from a quality education.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to improve their lives - assisting by giving the means to do it.
lender.occupational_info: Telling a long story short, so that other people can save time and money.

lender.name: Lorenzo
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the most fair, effective and simple way to help people all around our world.
lender.occupational_info: I do research and make experiments for the technology of the next generation

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I am loaning because i want to help people get the stuff they need.
lender.occupational_info: i go to school

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to loan to help loads of people buy new stuff and money. ps. see you next time!

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I can't be there to help in person.
lender.occupational_info: I work in medical research helping to keep it safe for volunteers.

lender.name: Berhanu
lender.occupational_info: Hello, I am very happy to hear about kiva from my best friend. And I am very interested to post my business plan on kiva website, just hoping that as I will get some fund to run my business. My name is berhanu from Ethiopia. I have great desire on Agricultural business, it include dairy farm, cattle farm, sheep farm, plantation of banana and other corps. I have enough land or farming place to run this business. I plan $ 5000 dollar to start this business. Therefore I am very happy if you raise the fund for my business plan. God bless you.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: Im inspired we can all make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Offshore oil and gas

lender.name: Theint
lender.loan_because: to fight poverty, to motivate entrepreneurial spirit as well.

lender.name: farul
lender.loan_because: It's better than outright donation.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the technology industry, managing service delivery for a large oil & gas customer.

lender.name: Paulo
lender.loan_because: To give people the chance of follow their dreams and change their lives.

lender.name: Pete Markey
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I want to support, a very real way, individuals and groups who are working hard to build businesses and actively trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a student but interested in computers

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: A life long technocrat who has witnessed first hand major developments in computing and consumer electronics and is now developing an awareness of global social issues.

lender.name: Hiew Hong Liang
lender.loan_because: A door to the economy is the greatest leveler. Enterprise and participation in production can set people free. The only question is whether we who have will deny the opportunity to those who have not.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: I wanted to walk the walk..

lender.name: Miss Anna
lender.loan_because: Although I may not have much money in the bank, I am abundantly wealthy in what matters
lender.occupational_info: I deliver mail

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It makes difference to the lives of those who will be using it.
lender.occupational_info: I work home based as an outsourced software developer.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.

lender.name: Kaaren
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and empowering people to create and maintain a business that will support themselves, their families and community.

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: I was at one time also striving to improve my life & know how it feels to struggle to make one's living. It is in this spirit of generosity that I wish to help others become empowered in their life to also achieve their life's goals. And oh..yes..it does also make me feel great to give & I know in my heart..it is the right generous act to do! ;-) We cannot be on this planet to be 'only about self'..we HAVE TO truly also care about others in our world & extend a helping hand! I cannot afford much living on a modest income myself, but I can help in my own small way! ;-))
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired, and am pleased to finally have the time to enjoy my family, my beloved pets & nice friends. I am in joy daily to have the time to do as I wish!! I do love to travel & see new places, like to learn their history, see their sights, try their culinary delights & meet the people of the area! I am a philosopher of sorts at heart & I like to impart the wisdom I have learned along my life's path with anyone who wishes it. I like to write stories & be on the computer, exercise to keep healthy & spend quality time with those I love. I enjoy the finer smaller free things in life, like the beauty & wonder of mother nature & I can be found knee deep in my garden, watching the friendly deer in my yard, smiling at their sweetness & tending my vegetables and flowers, a hobby I truly enjoy!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: Teach at a university.

lender.name: Miron
lender.loan_because: To support opportunities challenged by unfavorable conditions.
lender.occupational_info: Creation of complex computer systems to help businesses operate more efficiently.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: It's important to "pay it forward" in a manner that allows those in need to help themselves.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because:
My Family and I have a project that we have been working on, we have open our new website and that's far as we have reached, we would like to open an office for our fishing charter business, our dream is to sell Fishing Charters - Island Tours - Snorkeling Trips- Cruise Ship Tours and Charters - T shirts - hats - towels - hand made Island Arts - Island Sweets - and much more ... but we are unable to accomplish our dreams because we are in desperate need of financial support. we need and would like to make a loan of $3,000 in order to support and complete our family project would love to get the business up and running as soon as possible, 10 members of our family depends on our income, we have 4 kids that attend a private bilingual school + we also take care of our grandfather who needs round the clock attention and monthly doctor visits. our family needs your help, your help would be very much appreciated.
Thank You Best Regards Cynthia Mu√±oz
lender.occupational_info: my work is very active and productive we are very friendly people speaking english and spanish, booking tours and charters from the cruise ships - hotels - cabins and resorts on Roatan Island shuttle transportation services from and to the cruise ship. we also cook your catch

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with much, and I feel called to share with others.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: Someone once helped me when I was down, and short on money.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the building of construction, hospitals, universities, etc.

lender.name: Akemi
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to hope and dream. I also know that the realization of our dreams can depend on the inspirations of those kind souls around us who see our spark, and who nurture the spark into a blazing light.
lender.occupational_info: I help people realize their birthright: good health.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that capitalism can be a great catalyst for good.
lender.occupational_info: I run an internet marketing firm in the U.S. that is focused solely on reaching adults over the age of 50.

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: When I reach the age that my mummy can explain KIVA to me, I will have already helped so many people out!!!
lender.occupational_info: Just being cute at the moment

lender.name: Astrid Fiano
lender.loan_because: The need to alleviate poverty and help others be self-sustaining--save the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, attorney and writer. My fiction project is Gabriel's World, crime fiction, gay hero, social justice. I intend for my work to support good causes and encourage others to reach out and support one another.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: Everything I have is a loan from God, therefore I loan what I can in His name and for His glory.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: When I learned about Kiva I was excited that there was finally a way for entrepreneurs to help one another financially, even a world away. Knowing how difficult it is to find small loans for businesses, even in America. I'm eager to help give others a chance to prosper.

lender.name: Chris Enlow
lender.loan_because: It makes practical sense...empowering regular people like me to help alleviate poverty by lending to entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a spokesperson for my company and often communicate with consumers, trade associations and non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Mayevan
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people around the world. We are a brother and sister who have been saving money every month to give to a charity. We like the idea of being able to help many people with the same money.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in an elementary and middle school in Northern California.

lender.name: Rani & Amit
lender.loan_because: I feel the basic needs such as food, clothes, shelter, good health and a proper education should not be a luxury to anyone. Everyone should have an easy access to all these basic needs. I give because God has given me enough to help those for whom, unfortunately, these basic needs are still a luxury.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in a long-term and sustainable manner and enable them to change their lives and the lives of those around them. I believe this is best accomplished through micro-lending.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in companies for a living - most of them are small (a few people) but have big ideas.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info:
e-evolution.net are professional custom software development company operating out of the Gold Coast of Australia.
Our business-driven approach sets us apart from typical Software and Web development companies.
For more than fourteen years, we have built a reputation for creating a positive return on investment for our clients. If you are serious about your business and success, our team can help get you there.
As a complete Custom Software development company we offer customer-oriented Software and Web development services, and more importantly, deliver them effectively and on time.
Regardless of the size of your company, e-evolution.net, Gold Coast, Australia Software Development can help you develop both your online presence and backend database solution.

lender.name: Twenty 7 Group
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to be successful.

lender.name: kayla
lender.loan_because: I believe if you do good, you get good in return. My daughter is very sick and we try and help out as many as we can while other are helping out us as much as they can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother to a cystic fibrosis child. She is a little girl with a BIG disease.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I care and believe everyone should be given the opportunity to improve their circumstances especially if they are willing to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: Early Childhood Teacher

lender.name: Eternlslady
lender.loan_because: I like to help

lender.name: LUKE
lender.loan_because: i want to establish business of my own (self-employed)
lender.occupational_info: organizing a computer center, possibly internet services in my location

lender.name: Florian
lender.loan_because: I think loans are a more transparent and sustainable way to give.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps (in the words of the original Barefoot Investor!!) for people to "tread their own path"!!
lender.occupational_info: As an accountant, I help other people manage the finance side of their businesses to the best of our collective abilities.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate - good education, good job. Because I can afford to I think it is important to put something back to society
lender.occupational_info: It is my job to help support the staff who manage the business we work for. I do this by helping them to understand the costs and benefits of decisions they have made and are proposing to make

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to create opportunities.

lender.name: Shanta
lender.loan_because: I would like to expand my business, buying new machines to keep the machine park updated and in same shape as competitors from other countries.
lender.occupational_info: We manufacturer knitwear to companies spread over many continents. We work as a team to catch every possible profit. It's much hard work, but fun. I want Nepal to become a place where we may be proud over the living conditions for all parts of the society, even the poorest one.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: I worked in education before I retired and saw how far a little help could go. I have lupus and cannot volunteer, but at least I can still contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for libraries in schools.

lender.name: Brian Song
lender.loan_because: I believe that "Many drops make a shower."
lender.occupational_info: As a student, I have lived too passively, not contributing much to the world. I was busy only studying, not caring about others, but rather leading selfish lives. I would like to learn through this experience about how I can contribute to the world and help us become global leaders after. Also, I would like to help those who need our helps to stand on their own eventually. If what they need is us, we would be there for them. From Hermann Hesse's "Demian": The bird fights its way out of the egg. The egg is the world. Who would be born must first destroy a world. We believe that those who need our helps are like birds, and we would help them to destroy the egg, to come out and stand on their own.

lender.name: Andino Lucas
lender.loan_because: Hi! The lenders here are my students and me, together. We have used the website in class, and after learning about entrepreneurship and microloans, they decided to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher. I teach English to teenagers in the State school system.

lender.name: Jonathan and Therese
lender.loan_because: We only just read about microfinance initiatives and wanted to be a bit more directly involved in charitable work. We don't see microfinance as a panacea or holy grail to help poorer nations - merely another vehicle to achieve a more balanced world. Whilst charities can be involved in relief work, infrastructure and direct humanitarian aid maybe microfinance initiatives can help take up the slack when immediate relief is no longer needed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor, specialising in anaesthesia and intermediate care (ie helicopter retrieval). My wife is a speech therapist specialising in young children with language delays or hearing impairment. We both work solely in the public sector for the National Health Service here in the UK and do no private work (who has the time!?!)

lender.name: Bharati Desai
lender.loan_because: With God's grace I have my health, food on the table and roof over my head so I would like to share whatever little I have with less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Bring hope and peace round the world.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance too.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way of giving back. Starting businesses is my joy, helping others with their business is even more fun.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with new business concepts, help them determine how to start and where they want to go. I especially focus on licensing concepts.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: Microfinance diminishes suffering
lender.occupational_info: Making the world better

lender.name: Frans
lender.loan_because: All smal gifts make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer

lender.name: CoachGabe
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and I would like to be helped.
lender.occupational_info: My work is simple. Visit my page below. Apply for a grant and lets see what happens,(Everybody wins something) http://pokergrants.hpage.com

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I'd like to forward what's it meant to me to have people's help.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people buy and sell their residence.

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about God and His Kingdom. I teach people how they can live a good life. I also teach music.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jaakko
lender.loan_because: There are creative people in the world that need financial aid.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: What God has given me is not my own. I have been blessed and would like to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the admissions department of a University.

lender.name: Rashad
lender.occupational_info: I've started my own record label, also i have my own website www.teamsoreal.com which give upcoming artist a chance to win cash and prizes for good music

lender.name: Rick & Sue
lender.loan_because: Others around the world need some of our money about 100 times more than we do. We in the U.S. live in the wealthiest country, but our foreign aid contributions are minuscule -- we seem to harm more people than we help. It's really great to see the personal details of how I'm making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an energy auditor. I inspect people's homes and make measurements and calculations that help them determine how they can use less gas and electricity to run their homes.

lender.name: Marni
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping out those who want to do something that will benefit both themselves and their communities. Microloans can make a large impact and are affordable for me.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for online internet information sites as well as some magazines. I am beginning work on my first book as well.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who help themselves.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can. I have what I need to survive.. let's give somebody else the chance to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: Keepin' it green and keepin' it real. I think it is safe to say we are all waiting on the world to change.

lender.name: Oran Stainbrook
lender.occupational_info: Pacifitecture

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: Loans have helped me build my life, and will do again in the future. I understand the frustration not having access to loans can cause. I support the development of small business and see this as a way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Business Development Manger whose always worked for small business. I work to grow small businesses by finding new customers and growing relationships that already exist.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I like to loan to people who don't have as much as us.

lender.name: LeAnne
lender.loan_because: I can. Business and commerce is the way to break the poverty cycle- helping those help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a regional council that prides themselves on environmental protection. I help manage grants and collate information so that the work gets done and reported back to the community,

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: Reynolds American Inc. (NYSE:RAI) is the parent company of R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company, American Snuff Company, LLC, Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company, Inc. and Niconovum AB.

lender.name: claudia
lender.loan_because: I want people to succeed and this is such a great way!

lender.name: Ali Nicolas
lender.loan_because: Billions of people face huge challenges, and I want to make a positive difference in the world by helping those most in need. I hope my contributions, combined with others, will make a long-lasting impact in someone's life. Also, learning the stories and connecting with entrepreneurs around the world is extremely inspiring.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can! Every little bit helps. If I can make a small difference in someone's life, it is worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the wine industry

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference, no matter how small. Little things go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a relationship building sales role, in the construction industry

lender.name: Hayden
lender.occupational_info: Affinity Id use technology to better understand customers.rnTo start conversations and build deeper connections between our clients and their customers. We have a proven background in data analytics, creative solutions & innovative technical design.

lender.name: Nasha
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help individuals plan financially for their future and their children's future in order to achieve financial freedom after a certain age. It's really the most satisfying and gratifying job in the world!

lender.name: said
lender.loan_because: i need to start my own busnisess
lender.occupational_info: i wanna start a small parcel busnisess especially with holiday coming soon many people will be needed to send a gift parcel

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have the power to change a life, and by doing so, the lives surrounding that ones as well. I loan because I can, because someone else can't or won't. I loan to change what the world seems to determined to say can't be changed. I loan for every good left in this world, and all the good that will be restored, just through a simple act of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I want to save the world. I don't know how else to say it. I don't know how to do it quite yet either, for I am sure it is the most difficult task to take on. But I am sure it is possible. Through peaceful unity, accomplished understanding, and unconditional compassion, a better world is just a few long steps in front of us all.

lender.name: Win Lwin
lender.loan_because: Giving is recognized as a virtue in every major religion and in every civilized society, and it clearly benefits both the giver and the receiver. The one who receives is relieved from the pangs of want. The one who gives can take comfort from the joy their gift brings to others. - Dalai Lama

lender.name: Sumarno
lender.occupational_info: I work as a book editor in Concern, Jakarta.

lender.name: Lucia
lender.loan_because: If You Wanna Make The World A Better Place Take A Look At Yourself, And Then Make A Change

lender.name: Hannelore
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves me and all other people

lender.name: malcolm
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help people who are trying to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I show people how to do first aid on someone who is injured or unwell.

lender.name: John Liu
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Dima
lender.occupational_info: Fly phones seller in Russia

lender.name: Leena
lender.loan_because: I believe in human potential and change and because these small things add up.

lender.name: Liardon
lender.occupational_info: Roberts Liardon author, public speaker, spiritual leader, church historian and humanitarian was born in Tulsa, Oklahoma, the first male child born at Oral Roberts University. For this distinction he was named in honour of the University Founder. Thus, from the start of his life Roberts was destined to be one of the most well known Christian Authors and Orators of the 20th century. To date he has sold over 7,000,000 books worldwide which have been translated in more then 50 languages and is known internationally, having ministered in over 112 countries. An author of 54 books that continue to bless the body of Christ, Roberts continues to have a voice that speaks to this generation of believers and at the same time reaches out to those that are eager to read a relevant message that draws the heart closer to God.

lender.name: Chester
lender.loan_because: I represent the Kingdom Builders Sunday School Class of Trinity Baptist Church in San Antonio, Texas. Our class members contribute money on a regular basis and I loan these funds on their behalf.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves ensuring that the people who work for our organization, and advise our customers regarding the investment of their financial resources, do so within the standards, firm policies, and regulations of the United States financial securities industry.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a very large food company. I answer phones, do computer work, make appointments on calendars, and do office work.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, especially for female entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I have been involved in helping small businesses be competitive. I saw Kiva as a way to extend that to others.

lender.name: Angelika
lender.loan_because: I just watched the Documentary "Pray the Devil Back to Hell" about the Women's Revolution in Liberia.

lender.name: Robby Timmermans
lender.loan_because: I like to help people improve their lives

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it's too beautiful an opportunity to pass up.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: FastCashOnline is the oldest operating payday loan website on the Internet. Fast Cash was started in 1995 and went live on the Internet in 1997. Moto: apply today for cash tomorrow.

lender.name: Kalbinur
lender.loan_because: I want to increase your business
lender.occupational_info: I'm doing with computers and I like it I'll blogadaren those who will help me a Babe

lender.name: Holland
lender.loan_because: i hope to help people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: honor means a lot to me and if someone needs a little help, why should I not trust them to repay me?
lender.occupational_info: I teach and share music .

lender.name: kimberly
lender.loan_because: I would like to open up an adult foster care home, which will create jobs. .
lender.occupational_info: Provide health services to the elderly who would otherwise be admitted to a hospital.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should help in anyway they can.

lender.name: ReganR
lender.occupational_info: I work for a a non-for profit organization that is focused on reaching out to orphaned, abandoned and exploited children around the world. Our primary goal is to place children in godly families either through international adoption or by helping to mobilize their own people to care for their own children.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I have benefitted from visiting and working in many countries. I understand how hard it is for the majority of people in the world to make a living, yet I know the self-respect and self-worth that results from gainful work. I want to do as much as I can around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I run new and early growth stage companies.

lender.name: MAKAM SIYAD
lender.loan_because: I was one of the people that needed medicine and schools when growing up as a child
lender.occupational_info: Helping the community, the tribes and the poor by building clinics, hospitals, providing food and shelter dwellings for women and children.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.

lender.name: Paasha
lender.loan_because: each loan I make contributes to a growing economy and a stronger and more prosperous world!
lender.occupational_info: I study politics and governments across the world and am trying to find ways to improve governance and accountability in resource-rich countries.

lender.name: Matt Sicotte
lender.loan_because:
There is so much Potential in every One! And to Truly Give, is to Truly Receive! :)
Enjoy!
lender.occupational_info: I provide in-Formation to Guide to what You seek.

lender.loan_because: Because I'm thpecial.

lender.name: Nolberto

lender.name: Goforloan
lender.occupational_info: Go4loans is Australia‚Äôs leading home financial services provider which provides a wide range of personal loans, home loans, insurance, mortgage broker services, car loans and refinancing facility. Here user can get free quotes and appointment with experienced mortgage brokers.

lender.name: Wendy and Joe
lender.loan_because:
Thank you everyone for coming to our wedding! We feel very lucky to have your love and support.
In lieu of a favor, loans have been made to various entrepreneurs on this site. Once repaid, the credit will be reapplied to other loans in need.
This way, your gift is recycled indefinitely, and Joe and I will always have something to remember the special day by.
If you wish to try microlending but do not wish to register, please feel free to utilize this account using the login information provided at the wedding.
Thank you again for being part of our lives!

lender.name: Oliver
lender.occupational_info: I am a conservation & evolutionary biologist. I teach college students and do research.

lender.loan_because: i want to make a loan to improvethe remaining days of my life and touched the lives of some people in my home town by giving them work in dried fish re-packing business. as Packers and dried fish processors.
lender.occupational_info: during my stay in my hometown for 10months found out that there are a plenty of needshelp toalleviate their life. After planting their crops they have to wait for the harvest for 4 months and there are plentyof time which can beused productively.
